articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulations to Officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Congratulations to Officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Saturday sent a congratulatory message to all the officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The message noted that the 65-year-long proud history of the DPRK is recorded with the patriotic devotion made by the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan who have always shared their destiny with the socialist homeland, holding great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem.
					
					 Chongryon, though working in an alien land, has made a valuable contribution to the proud cause of bringing about the prosperity of the country and achieving the independent reunification, regarding the homeland as a cradle of its genuine life and a beacon of hope, it said, adding:
					
					 Today the DPRK is demonstrating its might as a prosperous socialist country. It is ascribable to the precious patriotic devotion and unrewarded efforts made by the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan who have ardently loved their homeland and devoted themselves to it with their fervor and enthusiasm.
					
					 The Juche-based homeland takes care of the destiny and future of the Korean nation in a responsible manner like a mother, and Chongryon and Koreans in Japan are members of the great family of the socialist homeland.
					
					 The message underscored the need for the officials of Chongryon and other Koreans in Japan to fully embody Kim Jong Il's patriotism in their practical patriotic work and make a tangible contribution to building a thriving nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 It expressed belief that Chongryon would creditably perform its mission and role as an overseas compatriots organization of Juche Korea and thus further exalt the honor of being an example of the overseas Koreans movement in the world.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Brazilian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Greetings to Brazilian President
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Dilma Vana Rousseff, president of the Federative Republic of Brazil, on Saturday on the occasion of the 191st anniversary of the independence of her country.
					 Kim expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Brazil developing on good terms would grow stronger in conformity with the common interests and desire of peoples of the two countries.
					
					 He wished her bigger success in the work for the social stability and economic development of the country.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Sends Greetings to Brazilian FM
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Sends Greetings to Brazilian FM
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs, sent a message of greeting to Luiz Alberto Figeiredo Machado, Brazilian foreign minister, on Saturday on the occasion of the 191st anniversary of independence of his country.
					 Pak in his message wished him success in the work, expressing the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger thanks to their common efforts.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces Suppression of Progressive Forces in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces Suppression of Progressive Forces in S. Korea 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- These days the south Korean conservative group is kicking up a whirlwind of campaign for arresting pro-reunification progressive forces. 
					 The fascist group including the "Saenuri Party", the puppet Intelligence Service and prosecution has become frantic with the campaign for suppressing the Unified Progressive Party and other progressive forces, under the pretexts of plotted rebellion and investigation into "forces seeking to bring down the social system". 
					
					 What is more intolerable is that they crack down upon those forces by deliberately linking them to the north. This is reminiscent of the repressive campaign under the pretext of security in the period of military fascist dictatorship. 
					
					 This campaign kicked off by the group with "the security law" and the Intelligence Service, means for escalating confrontation and pursuing dictatorial politics, cannot be construed otherwise than a horrible politically-motivated gambling aimed to weather its crisis. 
					
					 This is a new politically-motivated plot to intensify fascist dictatorship and spoil the atmosphere of the north-south dialogue as it is a modern brand witch hunt launched by those tight-cornered. 
					
					 As already known to the world, it is the trite method employed by the preceding dictators of south Korea to cook up shocking political cases to get rid of their crises. 
					
					 Whenever south Korea found itself in a political crisis its ruling quarters fabricated conspiratorial cases stunning the international community including the case of Kim Dae Jung's plotted rebellion in the period of the military dictatorship. 
					
					 But, all the plots to bury opposition forces politically and physically faced judgment of history without exception, sending the dictators to their graves. 
					
					 The recently cooked up case will be no exception. 
					
					 The recent disclosure of the truth behind the Intelligent Service's illegal interference in the election drove the present authorities of south Korea into a bottomless quagmire. 
					
					 Popular actions are gaining in scope and strength under the slogans "Election is invalid", "Dissolve IS" and "No revival of yusin dictatorship." And there are growing voices calling for improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The political landscape in south Korea has been completely paralyzed due to the strong protest actions of the people including opposition forces to disclose the farce of the "Saenuri Party" and the IS. 
					
					 The public has become more vocal pushing for momentum to north-south dialogue and cooperation as the atmosphere of dialogue mounted thanks to the north's strong will and efforts to achieve peace and actions have been grew stronger to call for early restarting the operation in the Kaesong Industrial Zone. These developments cannot but be a challenge to the confrontation forces. 
					
					 The daily growing anti-"government" tendency prompted the conservative group to create a new terror-ridden atmosphere under the pretext of security in a bid to settle its crisis. To this end it kicked up a repressive campaign by invoking the SL and setting the IS in motion. 
					
					 Through the on-going  suppression racket the fascist group seeks to stamp out political opponents including the pro-reunification progressive forces one by one and secure a pretext for maintaining  the SL and the IS which it considers as means for their existence and last strongpoint. 
					
					 It also seeks to secure a pretext for shifting the blame for the deteriorated north-south relations and the tension onto the north if necessary.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group had better bear in mind that all Koreans and the world community are closely following the north's sincere efforts for detente on the Korean Peninsula and in the region and watching with vigilance its acts to scuttle them. 
					
					 No anachronistic plots and methods of the group can ever weather the present political crisis in south Korea, a product of confrontation and dictatorial politics.
					
					 Will for national reconciliation, unity, peace and prosperity and practical actions are the best way of settling the south Korean political crisis. 
					
					 The conservative group's act of forgetting the lesson taught by history will only precipitate its doom.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Demands Withdrawal of U.S. Forces from S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- 68 years have passed since the U.S. occupied south Korea.
					 The U.S. occupation of south Korea became the starting point of the tragic division of the Korean nation, a nation that has lived as a homogenous nation sharing the same blood for centuries. This has dampened the desire and wishes of the nation for the unified development.
					
					 To look around the world, no country and the nation has been exposed to such big misfortune and sufferings with its unified development curbed by the foreign occupiers for such a long time as the Korean nation.
					
					 The U.S. forces presence in south Korea turned the Korean Peninsula into the world's biggest hotspot and posed grave threats to the world peace and stability, to say nothing of those in Northeast Asia.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the U.S. misleads the public opinion as if the "UN Command" and the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea are essential for the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula although 38 years have passed since the adoption of the UN General Assembly resolution on withdrawing all the foreign forces from the peninsula.
					
					 The former U.S. forces' commanders in south Korea blustered that the "UN Command" now plays a buffer role and that it has played a big role in keeping the stability and peace on the Korean Peninsula along with the U.S.-south Korea "Combined Command" and the U.S. forces present in south Korea.
					
					 This is brigandish sophism aimed to cover up the U.S. crime as the chieftain who harassed peace and stability on the peninsula, and to seek the U.S. forces' permanent presence in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea was a crime committed by the U.S. by abusing its position as a state which won a victory in the Second World War. It was not at the request of the Korean nation nor according to an international convention.
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea was a production of the U.S. aggressive ambition to separate Korea, occupy whole of Korea and, furthermore, dominate Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The U.S. occupation of south Korea by force was not aimed to "protect" civilians nor to ensure peace on the peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea going under the guise of "UN Command" is to blame for the serious situation on the Korean Peninsula which is at the crossroads of war or peace.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to keep its forces in south Korea for an indefinite period. According to the new national defence strategy envisaging the arms beef-up in Asia-Pacific region, the U.S. is claiming that its role is not just for "protection" but for the "maintenance of regional peace".
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea is taking up new nature and role as the forces in the foremost area and "strategic mobile forces" for realizing the U.S. strategy for containing China and Russia and holding military hegemony in the region.
					
					 In order to enhance the maneuverability and offensive capabilities of the U.S. forces in south Korea, the U.S. has steadily increased the frequency and scope of the military exercises under various codenames on the pretexts of coping with so-called "provocations" and "nuclear threats", pushing the situation to the state of war.
					
					 The U.S. forces in south Korea are a detached force and an advance unit for the invasion of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. intention is to use its forces in south Korea as an offensive forces on the first line in case of "emergency" on the peninsula and rapidly hurl its aggression troops in the Asia-Pacific region including those in Japan and on Okinawa into the Korean front so as to fight a blitz warfare.
					
					 According to the "2012 base structure report" published by the U.S. Defense Department, the U.S. has 11 000 more troops in south Korea now, compared with that in September 2009.
					
					 Defying this fact, the U.S. is claiming that its forces in south Korea is aimed at peace and stability on the peninsula and the region but this can convince no one.
					
					 Ruling mode in colonies has become an anachronistic one, today when all the countries and nations have opted for the road of independent progress.
					
					 Still running deep in the memories of the Koreans are grudge and hatred for the U.S. occupation forces who have inflicted the whole gamut of misfortune and pains on the Koreans, putting south Korea under their control for so many years.
					
					 It is the requirements of the times and the people aspiring after lasting peace and prosperity on the peninsula and the rest of the Northeast Asia to see the withdrawal of the U.S. forces.
					
					 Whether the U.S. withdraws its forces from south Korea or not is a touchstone showing whether it truly wants peace and stability on the peninsula or not.
					
					 If the U.S. is truly interested in peace and stability on the peninsula, it should take a bold decision of pulling its troops, the biggest hurdle in way of achieving peace, out of south Korea.

articles.title: Kyodo News Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Kyodo News Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kyodo News of Japan led by its Senior Executive Director Yujiro Sato arrived here by air on Saturday to participate in the celebrations of the 65th birth anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Delegations and Delegates of Foreign Groups for Study of Juche Idea Here
articles.content:
Delegations and Delegates of Foreign Groups for Study of Juche Idea Here
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Delegations and a delegate of foreign groups for the study of the Juche idea arrived here by air on Saturday to take part in the celebrations of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They include a delegation of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Secretary General of its Japanese National Liaison Council Fujio Hanawa, a delegation of the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Chairman Dmitri Kostenko, and Secretary General of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo Jean Mbongopassi.
					
					 Earlier arrivals included Shelton Garth Lawrence, chairman of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of South Africa.

articles.title: Delegations of Overseas Compatriots Arrive
articles.content:
Delegations of Overseas Compatriots Arrive
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Delegations of overseas compatriots arrived here Saturday to take part in the celebrations of the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 They included a delegation of the Association of Korean Businessmen in China, a delegation of Korean artistes in China, a delegation of the Association of Korean Economic Workers in Shenyang, China, a delegation of the Korean Association for Economic and Cultural Exchange in Dandong, China, a delegation of the Council of Compatriots in New Zealand and a delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia.
					
					 Also arriving on the same day were home-visiting groups of Koreans in Japan headed by Ro Kyong Sok and Choe Jo Ung respectively and a home-visiting group of students of Korean high school in Japan headed by Choe In Thae, principal of Korean primary, middle and high school in Ibaraki.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Bereaved Family of Hero of Republic
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Bereaved Family of Hero of Republic
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Korean compatriot Jong Il Sim, bereaved family of An Tong Su who is a hero of the Republic, on the occasion of the 65th birth anniversary of the DPRK.
					 It was handed over to an official concerned on Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Japanese Society for the Study of the Juche Idea Saturday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the DPRK.
					 They laid a floral basket before the statues in humble reverence for the peerlessly great men who founded the Juche idea and developed it and made an immortal contribution to the accomplishment of global independence before paying tribute.

articles.title: S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Minister's Reckless Remarks under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Newspapers Saturday in their commentaries urge the south Korean authorities to stop all hostile acts of disturbing peace and scuttling the efforts to improve the north-south relations.
					 South Korean Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin at the recent enlarged second meeting of defense ministers of ASEAN raised a hue and cry over the "nuclear and missile threat of the north" and claimed that  this poses "a serious threat" to peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the region. 
					
					Even he cried out for "leading the north to changes with strong deterrence."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says what  Kim Kwan Jin uttered is quite contrary to the trend of the present situation on the Korean Peninsula as they were full of distrust and hostility towards the north, dialogue partner and part of the same nation.
					
					 The south Korean military chief again trumpeted about "threat from the north" at a time when a way is being paved for dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south with much effort. This is a wicked act of chilling the atmosphere of detente.
					
					  Kim Kwan Jin earned an ill fame as a rare warmonger for groundlessly finding fault with the DPRK and repeatedly crying out for "strong counteraction and punishment" when he was defense minister under the Lee Myung Bak regime.
					
					 It should not go unnoticed that this dangerous warmonger utterly indifferent to dialogue and peace again got hysteric at a time when there is a sign of mending the north-south relations.
					
					 The anachronistic acts of the south Korean military forces to escalate the confrontation are stumbling blocks in the way of dialogue and peace.
					
					 Minju Joson says that the process to repair the north-south relations is moving at a snail's pace despite the sincere efforts on the part of the north because such confrontation maniacs as Kim Kwan Jin are working hard to 
					
					stem the trend of the times in south Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Birthday Marked at Its Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
DPRK's Birthday Marked at Its Embassy in Beijing
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing hosted a reception on Thursday to mark the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 Present there on invitation were Shen Yueyue, vice-chairwoman of the Standing Committee of the Chinese National People's Congress; Liu Zhenmin, Chinese vice-foreign minister; Ding Wei, vice-minister of Culture; Yang Yanyi, assistant to the head of the International Liaison Department of the C.C., Communist Party of China; Wu Donghe, chairman of the China-Korea Friendship Association; Wang Yongsheng, vice-president of the China National Defense University; Zhou Xisheng, vice-director general of the Xinhua News Agency; and other officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were DPRK Ambassador Ji Jae Ryong and staff members of his embassy in Beijing.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong in his speech praised President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il for founding the DPRK, building best socialism centered on the popular masses in it and reliably defending and further developing it.
					
					 He said it is the unshakable faith and fixed will of supreme leader Kim Jong Un to accomplish the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He affirmed that the DPRK will make positive efforts to steadily boost the traditional DPRK-China friendship which was nurtured and glorified by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il together with the leaders of China.
					
					 Shen Yueyue noted the founding of the DPRK 65 years ago made it possible for the Korean people to become masters of the country and create a new history of development and progress. 
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The Korean people have achieved shining successes in carrying out the cause of socialism, weathering all sorts of tests, under the leadership of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il, Kim Jong Un and the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It is the invariable line of China to steadily boost the traditional Sino-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations.
					
					 The Chinese side will make sustained joint efforts with the DPRK side and develop friendly exchange and practical cooperation with the DPRK in the spirit of inheriting tradition, facing up to the future, good neighborly relations and strengthening cooperation.

articles.title: 2013 Asian Cup and Club Weightlifting Championships to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
2013 Asian Cup and Club Weightlifting Championships to Be Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The 2013 Asian Cup and Club Weightlifting Championships will take place here from September 11 to 17.
					 The championships, to be held in junior and senior divisions, will draw more than 200 weightlifters from 10 countries and regions, including the DPRK, China, Kuwait and Thailand.
					
					 Weightlifting is considered to be one of the hopeful events for the DPRK.
					
					 In recent years the DPRK has proved successful in Asian and world weightlifting championships. 
					
					 It won three gold medals in the 30th London Olympics, with Rim Jong Sim in women's 69 kg category, Kim Un Guk in men's 62 kg and Om Yun Chol in men's 56 kg. Kim Un Guk and Om Yun Chol set the world and Olympic records.
					
					 The DPRK garnered 18 gold, 4 silver and 6 bronze medals in the 2012 Asian Junior and Juvenile Weightlifting Championships and seven gold and four silver medals in the 2013 World Youth Weightlifting Championships. 
					
					 It topped the team standings in the 2013 Asian Weightlifting Championships, with 15 gold, eight silver and five bronze medals.
					
					 The DPRK boasts of weightlifting aces, including Kim Myong Nam who bettered the world records four times in world weightlifting championships and Ri Song Hui who won gold medals in the 15th World Women's Weightlifting Championships and the 12th and 13th Asian Women's Weightlifting Championships.

articles.title: FIFA Course for Reserve Footballers Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
FIFA Course for Reserve Footballers Held in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- A FIFA course for reserve footballers took place at Pyongyang International Football School from Sept. 2 to 6.
					 The course, divided into lectures and practices, drew instructors of juvenile sports schools from across the country and some 130 schoolers aged from 8 to 12. 
					
					 It was officiated by a FIFA development officer, Lim Kim Chon.
					
					 It dealt with the methods of training, guidance and assessment suitable to different ages.
					
					 Kim Chol Ung, a deputy department director of the DPRK Football Association, told KCNA that the course focused on increasing the interest of schoolers in football.

articles.title: 11th National Ssirum Contest Closes
articles.content:
11th National Ssirum Contest Closes
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The 11th Grand Bull Prize National Ssirum Contest closed on Friday.
					 Those who won the first place in the individual body-weight category events were Kim Hyang Bong (North Phyongan Province) in 50 kg, Jang In Myong (Pyongyang) in 55 kg, Ri Song Guk (North Hwanghae Province) in 60 kg, Kim Kyong Il (North Phyongan Province) in 70 kg and Kye Chang Bom (North Phyongan Province) in 80 kg category.
					
					 In the group events Pyongyang team took the first, South Hwanghae Province team the second and North Phyongan Province team the third.
					
					 The catch-weight category events in which 8 players competed with each other to become the owner of the bull prize were a heated see-saw battle.
					
					 Son Kwang Chol from South Hwanghae Province defeated all his rivals and took the laurel in the events.
					
					 Kim Kum Chol from Kangwon Province and Yu Song Su from North Hamgyong Province respectively took the second and third places.
					
					 At an awarding and closing ceremony Son Kwang Chol received a 1000 kg bull, a golden cowbell and diploma.

articles.title: Military Families on Jangjae and Mu Islets Move to New Houses
articles.content:
Military Families on Jangjae and Mu Islets Move to New Houses
 Kangryong, September 6 (KCNA) -- Military families on Jangjae and Mu islets moved to new houses in the run up to the significant 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 Barracks, dwelling houses, branch schools and kindergartens on the forefront islets have been successfully rebuilt as required by the era of Songun.
					
					 The houses which look like rest homes have living rooms with kitchens and bathrooms attached and other amenities. They are furnished with TV sets and household goods.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un visited the Jangjae Islet Defence Detachment and Mu Islet Hero Defence Detachment several times, showing warm loving care for soldiers and military families there.
					
					 The builders staged a vigorous drive to rebuild the barracks and houses at the best level to the convenience of soldiers and the military families.
					
					 As soon as the designs were completed, they pulled down old buildings and carried out groundwork in a brief span of time. They pushed ahead with the wall building, roofing and outside and inside plastering, giving precedence to the transport of building materials even under the unfavorable situation where they had to bring them by boats. They carried out the projects for building barracks and houses in the spirit of constructing their own houses and built modern branch schools and kindergartens.
					
					 The appearance of barracks and houses on the islets has undergone a dramatic change thanks to the devoted efforts of the builders.
					
					 Military families moved to new houses on Friday amid best wishes of generals and officers of the KPA.

articles.title: Juche-Based Line of Building Government
articles.content:
Juche-Based Line of Building Government
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- September 9 marks the 65th birthday of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 With the approach of the day, the Korean people pay highest respects to President Kim Il Sung, who founded the DPRK centered on the popular masses.
					
					 Early in Juche 15 (1926) when he was engaged in revolutionary activities at Hwasong Uisuk School, he pictured the kind of government to be built after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule.
					
					 In the historic report "The Path of the Korean Revolution" he made at the Kalun Meeting in June 1930, he advanced the Juche-based line of building government.
					
					 The line suggested that the to-be-built government be a genuine people's power which serves the popular masses after being organized by themselves and which is based on the worker-peasant alliance led by the working class and relies on the unity of the popular masses of broad social strata.
					
					 In the period of the armed struggle he launched against the Japanese invaders, he successfully carried into practice the Juche-based line of building people's government, establishing the people's revolutionary government in guerrilla bases in liberated areas.
					
					 The people's revolutionary government established by Kim Il Sung in vast area along the River Tuman in the first half of the 1930s was a predecessor of the people's power in the DPRK after the country's liberation.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Observed by Foreign Crewmen
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Observed by Foreign Crewmen
 Hamhung, September 7 (KCNA) -- Meetings of crewmen of the Kiribati-flagged ship "New Global" and a Cambodian ship took place at Hungnam Port and Wonsan Port respectively on Saturday on the occasion of the 65th birth anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Participants laid bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, in Hamhung, South Hamgyong Province and the mosaic depicting Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il with broad smiles on their faces in Wonsan, Kangwon Province and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meetings were the captain and crewmen of the ships.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK and performed immortal exploits in strengthening and developing it into a socialist state centered on popular masses.
					
					 Kim Jong Il with his unique Songun policy turned the DPRK into a socialist political and military power of Juche and firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and the nation, they noted.
					
					 They said that the dignity and might of the DPRK have reached the highest level as the Korean people hold Marshal Kim Jong Un in high esteem as their supreme leader.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the Korean people advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, they stressed.
					
					 The messages of greetings to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings.

articles.title: Birthday of DPRK Observed in China
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Observed in China
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held round-table talks in Shenyang on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Vice- Chairman Choe Su Bong and officials of the above-said association and Hwang Yong Du, chairman of its Liaoning regional association.
					
					 Choe Su Bong made a keynote speech titled "We warmly greet the 65th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK".
					
					 He stressed that the DPRK, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence, could be built thanks to the wise leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He noted that the plan of the Generalissimos to build a rich and powerful nation is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He declared that the officials of his association and all the Koreans in China would deeply cherish the honor and pride of being overseas citizens of Juche-oriented Korea and make a tangible contribution to the patriotic work to further glorify the DPRK, keeping pace with the people in the motherland who are vigorously advancing at the "speed  on Masik Pass" under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Then speeches were made there.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the round-table talks.
					
					 At the end of the talks the participants watched a Korean film.

articles.title: Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
articles.content:
Magazine "Paektu-Halla" Issued
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China released the August magazine "Paektu-Halla."
					 Carried in the magazine is a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un acknowledging the enthusiastic cheers of crowds in the tribune of honor of the military parade and a mass demonstration to celebrate the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 The magazine allots much space to accounts of the military parade and mass demonstration held in the presence of Kim Jong Un to celebrate the anniversary.
					
					 It carries news that Kim Jong Un met the delegation of the People's Republic of China on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of the 60th anniversary of the victory in the war and visited the cemetery of fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers.
					
					 It edits news that the above-said association and its affiliated bodies laid floral baskets before the statue of President Kim Il Sung at the Yuwen Middle School in Jilin and the full-length picture of Kim Il Sung standing together with leader Kim Jong Il in the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang and a remembrance meeting and round-table talks with the delegation of Korean war veterans in China were held, on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of demise of Kim Il Sung and the diamond jubilee of the war victory.
					
					 It recalls that the delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China, the delegation of the Korean War veterans in China and the delegation of the Korean businessmen's association in China received warm loving care in the homeland.
					
					 It carries articles titled "Country to emerge victorious in any war" and "Under care of benevolent country" written by compatriots in China and an article titled "DPRK-one big family" written by the Koreans' Group for the Study of the Idea of Independence in the United States and others.
					
					 It informs its readers that the association sent a letter of solidarity to an overseas compatriots' congress for supporting peace on the Korean Peninsula held in Moscow.
					
					 It carries news that DPRK women soccer team emerged a winner in the 2013 East Asian Cup and the waves of actions to issue declarations on the situation and candlelight struggle to denounce the Intelligence Service's interference in the election are sweeping south Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Bangladeshi Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Carried by Bangladeshi Newspapers
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The detailed gist of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was carried by Bangladeshi papers Natun Bangla and Weekly Industry on September 1.  The talk was carried by Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, the Day of Songun.

articles.title: Foreign Newspapers Observe Birthday of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Newspapers Observe Birthday of DPRK
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Malaysian and British newspapers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The Malaysian paper Guang Ming Daily on September 2 carried an article titled "Country for the people" illustrated with a photo dealing with the revolutionary activities of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper stressed that as President Kim Il Sung founded the DPRK 65 years ago the Korean people could hew out their destiny as genuine masters of the state and society for the first time in their history.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il devoted himself to the strengthening and development of the socialist system centered on the popular masses true to the President's idea of believing in people as in Heaven, it noted.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The DPRK turned into a genuine state centered on the popular masses thanks to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who devoted their all to the people, always finding themselves among them.
					
					 The above-mentioned idea of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il has been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Korean people.
					
					 The Korean people enjoy a bountiful and a highly civilized life under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The September-October issue of a British newspaper carried an article titled "Celebrations of the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK" introducing the history of victory and glory of the DPRK.

articles.title: irthday of DPRK Marked in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Birthday of DPRK Marked in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in Britain, Poland and Iran from August 30 to September 1 to mark the 65th birthday of the DPRK.
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) said in a speech that the DPRK founded on Sept. 9, 1948 has developed into an invincible socialist state under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and general secretary Kim Jong Il for the past 65 years.
					
					 The U.S. ignited a war against the DPRK in June, 1950 to nip it in the bud but its army and people inflicted upon the U.S. imperialists a heavy defeat, the first of its kind in history, and defended its sovereignty and dignity, he noted, adding:
					
					 In the post-war period, too, the DPRK has achieved victory only in the ceaseless confrontation with the U.S.
					
					 The DPRK firmly defended socialism and achieved fresh successes in the revolution and construction under the worst situation where the imperialist allied forces intensified their offensive to stifle socialism and the DPRK was hit by unprecedented natural disasters for consecutive years.
					
					 The Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) wishes the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government greater successes in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and improve the living standard of the people under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Executive Committee of the Warsaw Regional Committee of the Polish Communist Party praised Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for turning the DPRK into a political and ideological power and a military power by embodying the Juche idea, Songun idea.
					
					 The talk published by Kim Jong Un on August 25 is the most vivid expression of his noble intention to glorify forever the Songun idea and exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the chairman said.

articles.title: Impressions of DPRK Given by British Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Impressions of DPRK Given by British Political Party Leader 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The September-October issue of the organ of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) carried travelogues on the DPRK contributed by Chairman of its Central Committee Harpal Brar and Vice-chairman and International Secretary Ella Rule under the headline "Celebrations of 60th Victory of Fatherland Liberation War" illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung.
					 The paper said:
					
					 On July 27, 1953 the U.S. signed the Korean Armistice Agreement little short of a surrender document, the first of its kind in history.
					
					 The delegation of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) and other delegations and delegates of many countries visited the DPRK to celebrate this historic victory together with the Korean people.
					
					 The delegation of the Communist Party of Great Britain (Marxist-Leninist) celebrated the victory day with the Korean people to express solidarity with their struggle to fulfill their international obligation towards the world revolution, force the U.S. imperialists out of south Korea and achieve peaceful reunification.
					
					 It also supported the Korean people in their cause of defending the sovereignty of their country from the U.S. imperialists' hostile policy.
					
					 During its stay in the DPRK the delegation witnessed the energetic external activities conducted by supreme leader Kim Jong Un and keenly realized once again his steadfast will and determination to firmly defend Korean socialism.
					
					 The DPRK's initiatives and efforts for peace and the Korean people's desire for peace have faced a grave challenge of the U.S.
					
					 But a war did not break out on the Korean Peninsula but peace has been preserved there thanks to the consistent efforts of the Workers' Party of Korea for peace and the DPRK's reliable war deterrence.
					
					 In case a new war breaks out, the DPRK will bring a historic end to the U.S.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Demand U.S. and S. Korean Regime Halt Anti-DPRK War Moves
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Demand U.S. and S. Korean Regime Halt Anti-DPRK War Moves 
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on August 31 in support of the statement released by the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK (NDC) "The U.S. and the south Korean authorities should face up to the trend of the times and think twice".
					 Noting the hard-won atmosphere of reconciliation on the Korean Peninsula is now facing a blatant challenge due to the unjust behaviors of the U.S. imperialists and the puppet clique of south Korea, the statement said:
					
					 U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique staged the aggressive Ulji Freedom Guardian war drills from August 19 and desperately conducted leaflet scattering operations against the DPRK, once again revealing their sinister design to slander the DPRK and bring down its social system.
					
					 In the meantime, the  U.S. imperialists let its strategic nuclear bombers fly into south Korea in succession, while noisily calling for the DPRK's "dismantlement of nukes." 
					
					 This indicates that the "improvement of relations" and "confidence building" touted by the U.S. and south Korean regime are no more than an empty talk aimed to conceal the ulterior motive of reckless warmongers.
					
					 We fully support the statement issued by the spokesman for the Policy Department of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime should stop the criminal war moves against the DPRK at once.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of Russian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Talk Posted on Website of Russian Political Party
 Pyongyang, September 7 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's talk "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted on the website of the Party of "Communists of Russia" on August 30.  The talk was carried in Rodong Sinmun, organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, and Joson Inmingun, organ of the Korean People's Army, on August 25, the Day of Songun.
					 The website carried a photo of general secretary Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje a Chongryon y coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje a Chongryon y coreanos residentes en Japon 
 Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 65o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un remitio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion a los funcionarios de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) y los demas coreanos este pais asiatico.
					 La misiva senala que en la orgullosa trayectoria de 65 anos de la RPDC estan grabadas las huellas patrioticas de los funcionarios de la Chongryon y otros coreanos residentes en Japon, quienes siempre compartieron el destino con la patria socialista enalteciendo a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Subraya que la Chongryon hizo aporte valioso a la prosperidad de la RPDC y al cumplimiento de la digna causa para la reunificacion independiente tomando la patria madre como cuna de la vida verdadera y farol de la esperanza aun en el lejano territorio extranjero.
					
					 Apunta que hoy dia la RPDC ostenta su gallardo aspecto como Corea socialista prospera. Alli estan grabados los nobles esfuerzos patrioticos de los funcionarios de la Chongryon y otros coreanos residentes en Japon quienes aman infinitamente la patria y la apoyan abnegadamente dedicando todos sus entusiasmos y pasiones.
					
					 Asevera que la patria del Juche es el gran regazo que responsabiliza el destino y el futuro de la nacion coreana y la Chongryon, y los coreanos residentes en Japon son los familiares preciosos de la RPDC.
					
					 Destaca  que los funcionarios de la Chongryon y otros coreanos residentes en Japon deben materializar cabalmente el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il en sus practicas patrioticas y contribuir con peculiaridad a la construccion de Estado prospero y el cumplimento de la empresa de reunificacion.
					
					 Expone firme confianza de que la Chongryon cumpla seguramente su mision y deber como entidad de ciudadanos en ultramar de la Corea del Juche y ponga de pleno manifiesto el orgullo de modelo del movimiento mundial de los residentes en ultramar.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe a Dennis Rodman y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe a Dennis Rodman y su comitiva
 Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un se reunio con el ex jugador de NBA de Estados Unidos, Dennis Rodman, y su comitiva.
					 Tras recibir con gusto a los visitantes, el sostuvo cordiales conversaciones con ellos.
					
					 Dio calida bienvenida a Dennis Rodman quien volvio a visitar como amigo la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en el buen tiempo y le dijo que visitara cuandoquiera a Corea y pasara dias agradables tomando descanso.
					
					 Rodman dio muchas gracias al Mariscal por haber recibido a el y sus acompanantes aunque esta muy ocupado. Anadio que este hecho es una muestra de buena fe hacia el pueblo norteamericano.
					
					 Prosiguio que tuvo la fortuna de  volver a visitar Corea porque establecio la amistad con  el Mariscal magnanimo.
					
					 Expreso la voluntad de contribuir activamente al intercambio deportivo y cultural de diferentes formas.
					
					 Dennis Rodman dedico al Mariscal y Ri Sol Ju regalo preparado con el maximo respeto y devocion.
					
					 El Mariscal presencio con los visitantes un partido de baloncesto entre el equipo 25 de Abril y el Amnokgang y ofrecio una cena en honor de ellos.
					
					  Rodman expreso sincero agradecimiento al Mariscal, quien dedico muchas horas para el y su comitiva agasajandoles, y apunto que guardara esta visita en el corazon como hermoso recuerdo nunca olvidable.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a Dilma Rousseff
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a Dilma Rousseff
 Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En ocasion del 191o aniversario de la independencia de Brasil, Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 7 un mensaje de felicitacion a la presidenta de ese pais carioca Dilma Rousseff.
					 En su misiva, el remitente expresa su conviccion de que seguiran ampliandose e intensificandose las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre RPDC y Brasil, que se desarrollan favorablemente, de acuerdo con los intereses y deseos comunes de los pueblos de ambos paises. 
					
					 Y desea de todo corazon a la destinataria mayores resultados en la labor para lograr la estabilidad social y el desarrollo economico del pais.

articles.title: ACNC comenta juego politico del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta juego politico del Sur de Corea
						
 Pyongyang, 7 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En estos dias, la banda de conservadores surcoreanos desata la ola de arresto a las fuerzas progresistas por la reunificacion.
					 El "Partido Saenuri", el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia, la fiscalia y otras hordas fascistas reprimen con frenesi a las fuerzas progresistas incluyendo el Partido Progresista Unido acusandolas del caso de conspiracion para una rebelion y hablando de la investigacion sobre "las fuerzas para derribar el regimen".
					
					 Lo problematico es que lo hacen relacionandolo  tercamente con la RPDC.
					
					 La presente represion hace recordar la epoca de dictadura fascista militar. 
					
					 El presente incidente siendo la caza de bruja de version moderna deviene una nueva artimana politica de los arrinconados tendente a intensificar la dictadura fascista y  congelar el ambiente de dialogo entre el Norte y el Sur.
					
					 Como es conocido por todo el mundo, la invencion del sorprendente caso intrigante politico es el metodo predilecto de los dictadores surcoreanos para evitar sus crisis.
					
					 Cuando se creaba en el territorio surcoreano la crisis politica ocurrieron los casos intrigantes que consternaban la sociedad internacional, entre otros, el caso de arresto de Kim Dae Jung.
					
					 Pero, tales casos para enterrar politica y fisicamente a los opositores fueron sentenciados por la historia.
					
					 Ahora, las autoridades surcoreanas estan en aprietos una vez que fue descubierto el verdadero aspecto del caso de la ilegal intervencion del Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia en las elecciones presidenciales.
					
					 Se amplia rapidamente la lucha masiva bajo las consignas "invalidez del resultado de las elecciones", "Disolver el SIN" y "Oposicion a resucitacion de la dictadura de renovacion" y se aumenta la voz de demanda a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 Por la fuerte resistencia de las fuerzas de partidos opositores y distintos estratos para descubrir el complot del "Partido Saenuri" y el SNI, la situacion del pais esta totalmente paralizada.
					
					 Para las fuerzas conflictivas es una carga el hecho de que se eleva el clima de dialogo gracias a la voluntad y los esfuerzos de la RPDC por la paz y la opinion publica demanda activar el dialogo y las cooperaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea inclusive la reanudacion previa de la Zona Industrial de Kaesong.
					
					 Ante el cada dia mas furioso clima anti-"gubernamental" la banda conservadora necesita movilizar las fuerzas publicas para salvar la situacion, asi que levanto una ola de represion en virtud de la "ley de seguridad" e incitando al SNI.
					
					 A traves del presente caso la banda fascista intenta coger dos pajaros de un tiro, o sea  persigue eliminar una tras otra las fuerzas politicas de oposicion inclusive las fuerzas progresistas pro-reunificacion, en tanto trata de mantener la ley de seguridad y el SNI, medios de existencia y el sosten final de las fuerzas conversadoras.
					
					 En el caso necesario, intenta preparar de antemano el pretexto para imputar a la RPDC la responsabilidad del empeoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y exacerbacion de la situacion de la region.
					
					 A decir verdad, esto es un peligrosisimo juego politico y provocacion imperdonable contra el clima de la paz y el dialogo.
					
					 La banda conservadora del Sur de Corea debe tener presente que toda la nacion coreana y la sociedad internacional observan atentamente tanto los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por el alivio de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y sus resultados como los actos que contravienen a este ambiente favorable.
					
					 Con este aparato y metodo anacronicos no se puede salvar la actual crisis politica del Sur de Corea creada por la confrontacion y la politica dictatorial.
					
					 Solo la reconciliacion y la unidad nacional, la voluntad de la paz y prosperidad y las acciones practicas son el remedio mejor para salvar la actual politica del Sur de Corea.
					
					 La accion que olvida las lecciones de la historia acelerara la autodestruccion.
